original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: you are not even able to do what needs to be done for yourselves,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis /
translated: let alone for others.

original: de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag kyang bde bar gyis shig /
analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag kyang bde bar gyis shig /
translated: So, having given gifts, make yourselves happy!

original: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /
analyzed: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /
translated: And make others happy!🔽Do not be overcome by poverty, eating the flesh of your own children, and not be free from the three lower realms!’

original: phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur te re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur te re zhes chos ston to //
translated: “They teach the Dharma like this.

original: sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: To those sentient beings who have bad ethics, they teach the Dharma like this:

original: kye skyes bu dag /🔽tshul @373b khrims ngan pa ni /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag / tshul @373b khrims ngan pa ni /
translated: ‘Oh, beings!

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: Bad ethics are suffering.

original: tshul khrims ngan pas ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pas ni /
translated: Because of bad ethics,

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: you will not be able to accomplish your own purpose,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
translated: let alone the purpose of others.

original: tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni /
translated: The result of bad ethics is

original: sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: the hells,🔽the animal world,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or the world of Yama.

original: de ltar khyod ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyod ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,🔽let alone others.

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi; de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi; de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, you must not allow even a single thought of bad ethics to arise.🔽Later, you will regret it.’

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: They teach the Dharma like this.

original: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: They teach the Dharma to those who are hostile to each other:

original: de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /
analyzed: de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /
translated: ‘Do not be hostile to each other!

original: sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: When the mind is disturbed, no wholesome factors can arise.

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na /🔽sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am /
analyzed: khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na / sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am /
translated: if you are hostile to each other,🔽you will be reborn in the hells,🔽in the animal realms,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gang gnas yod kyi /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gang gnas yod kyi /
translated: or in the world of Yama.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: do not give an opportunity to even a single thought of hostility.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not later have regrets!’

original: sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: They teach the Dharma to those who are lazy:

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Oh people,

original: le lo ni /
analyzed: le lo ni /
translated: laziness

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: is suffering.

original: le los ni /
analyzed: le los ni /
translated: Because of laziness,

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: you will not be able to accomplish your own goals, let alone those of others.

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /🔽le lo'i rnam @374a *//
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te / le lo'i rnam @374a *//
translated: What need is there to speak of benefiting others?

original: par smin pa ni /🔽sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: The fully ripened effect of laziness is🔽to be born in the hells,🔽among animals,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or in the world of Yama.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos te /
translated: let alone save others.

original: de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, you must not allow even the slightest opportunity for laziness.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Later on, you will regret it.

original: sems can sems g-yengs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can sems g-yengs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: To those sentient beings whose minds are distracted, they teach the Dharma as follows:

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Oh people,

original: sems g-yeng ba ni /
analyzed: sems g-yeng ba ni /
translated: a distracted mind

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: is suffering.

original: gang sems g-yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni /🔽sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: gang sems g-yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: The fully ripened effect of a distracted mind is🔽to be born in the hells,🔽among animals,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or in the world of Yama.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you.

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: What need is there to speak of saving others?

original: de'i phyir khyed kyis g-yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis g-yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, do not allow even the slightest opportunity for distraction.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Later, you will regret it.

original: sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: To those sentient beings who have faulty wisdom, he teaches the Dharma as follows:

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Oh people!

original: shes rab 'chal ba ni /
analyzed: shes rab 'chal ba ni /
translated: Faulty wisdom

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: is suffering.

original: shes rab 'chal bas ni /
analyzed: shes rab 'chal bas ni /
translated: With faulty wisdom,

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: you cannot accomplish your own purpose,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te / de ltar na /
translated: let alone the purpose of others.

original: shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the result of faulty wisdom

original: sems can dmyal ba'am /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'am /
translated: is the hells,

original: byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: the animal realm,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: and the world of Yama.

original: de ltar @374b khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de ltar @374b khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: In this way, you will not give an opportunity to even a single thought of stupidity.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not later become regretful.”

original: 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro //🔽zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro // zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro //
translated: To those who engage in desire, they teach the repulsiveness of the body.🔽To those who engage in anger, they teach love.

original: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro //
analyzed: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro //
translated: To those who engage in ignorance, they teach dependent origination.

original: lam ngan par zhugs pa la spyod pa de dag ni /
analyzed: lam ngan par zhugs pa la spyod pa de dag ni /
translated: To those who engage in the wrong path,

original: yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te /
translated: they teach the right path.

original: nyan thos kyi lam mam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi lam mam /
translated: They teach the path of the śrāvakas,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
translated: the path of the pratyekabuddhas,🔽and the path of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: They teach the Dharma to them in this way:

original: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni /
analyzed: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni /
translated: ‘The phenomena that you are attached to

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: are empty of their own essence.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni /
translated: In those dharmas which are empty of an intrinsic nature,

original: mngon par zhen par mi nus te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi nus te /
translated: one cannot settle down.

original: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: For emptiness is not something to settle down in.

original: zhes chos ston te /
analyzed: zhes chos ston te /
translated: He teaches the Dharma like this to sentient beings.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no //
translated: Subhūti, in that way, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they stand in the superknowledges and work for the welfare of sentient beings.

original: de lta'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste /
analyzed: de lta'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste /
translated: With that very pure divine eye, which is beyond that of humans, they see all the world systems in the southern direction.

original: de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am /
translated: They go there by their magical power and give gifts,

original: tshul khrims sam /🔽bzod pa'am / brtson 'grus sam /
analyzed: tshul khrims sam / bzod pa'am / brtson 'grus sam /
translated: or guard morality,🔽or cultivate patience,

original: bsam gtan nam /
analyzed: bsam gtan nam /
translated: or make an effort at perseverance,🔽or become absorbed in concentration,

original: shes rab bam /
analyzed: shes rab bam /
translated: or cultivate wisdom,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam /
translated: or cultivate the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams sam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams sam /
translated: or cultivate the right efforts,

original: @375a *// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
analyzed: @375a *// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
translated: or cultivate the legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po rnams sam /
analyzed: dbang po rnams sam /
translated: the faculties,

original: stobs rnams sam /
analyzed: stobs rnams sam /
translated: the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
translated: the branches of enlightenment,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
translated: the noble eightfold path,🔽the emptiness gate of liberation,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /
translated: the signlessness gate of liberation,🔽the wishlessness gate of liberation,

original: bsam gtan rnams sam /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams sam /
translated: the concentrations,

original: tshad med pa rnams sam /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams sam /
translated: the immeasurables,🔽the formless absorptions,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam; rnam par thar pa rnams sam /🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams sam /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam; rnam par thar pa rnams sam / ting nge 'dzin rnams sam /
translated: the liberations,🔽the meditative stabilizations,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: the serial absorptions,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
translated: the fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam /🔽byams pa chen po'am /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam / byams pa chen po'am /
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽great love,

original: snying rje chen po'am /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'am /
translated: great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam /
translated: the distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: nyan thos kyi chos sam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi chos sam /
translated: the dharmas of śrāvakas,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
translated: the dharmas of pratyekabuddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
translated: the dharmas of bodhisattvas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de /
translated: They benefit beings through the Dharma and they do what needs to be done for those beings.🔽To those beings who are stingy, they teach the Dharma like this:

original: de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig /🔽phongs pa ni /
analyzed: de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig / phongs pa ni /
translated: ‘Give gifts!🔽Poverty is suffering.

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /🔽phongs pas ni /🔽bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste / phongs pas ni / bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: Poverty🔽makes it impossible to accomplish your own goals, let alone the goals of others.

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyi; de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyi; de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /
translated: So, having given gifts, make yourselves happy!

original: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /
analyzed: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /
translated: Make others happy too!

original: phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum @375b las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum @375b las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not let yourselves be overcome by poverty, eating your own flesh, and not be liberated from the three lower realms!’

original: sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: To those beings who have bad ethics, they teach the Dharma like this:

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Hey, people!

original: tshul khrims ngan pa ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pa ni /
translated: Bad ethics

original: sdug bsngal ba ste; tshul khrims ngan pas ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste; tshul khrims ngan pas ni /
translated: With bad ethics,

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: you will not be able to accomplish your own aims,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
translated: let alone the aims of others.

original: tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni /
translated: The results of bad ethics are🔽the hells,

original: sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: the animal realm,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: and the world of Yama.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone others.

original: de'i phyir khyod kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyod kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, you must not allow even a single thought of bad ethics to arise.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Later, you will regret it.”

original: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /
analyzed: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /
translated: To those sentient beings who have harmful thoughts toward each other, they teach the Dharma as follows: “Do not have harmful thoughts toward each other.

original: sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: When the mind is disturbed, no virtuous qualities can arise.

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na /
analyzed: khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na /
translated: if you become disturbed with each other,

original: sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am /
analyzed: sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am /
translated: you will be reborn in the hells,🔽in the animal realm,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi /
translated: or in the world of Yama.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: khyed kyis 'khrugs pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: khyed kyis 'khrugs pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: do not give an opportunity to even a slight disturbance of mind.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //🔽sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos @376a *//
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to // sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos @376a *//
translated: Later on, you will regret it.🔽To those sentient beings who are lazy, he gives this teaching:

original: ston te / kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: ston te / kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Oh people,

original: le lo ni /
analyzed: le lo ni /
translated: laziness

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: is suffering.

original: le los ni /
analyzed: le los ni /
translated: Because of laziness,

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: you are unable to accomplish your own goals,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /🔽le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni; sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te / le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni; sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: let alone the goals of others.🔽The ripening of laziness is rebirth as a hell being,🔽an animal,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or in the world of Yama.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone others.

original: de'i phyir khyed kyi le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyi le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, we will not give you the opportunity to be lazy even for a moment.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not later become regretful.

original: sems can sems g-yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can sems g-yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: To those sentient beings whose minds are distracted, they teach the Dharma like this:

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Oh people!

original: sems g-yeng ba ni /
analyzed: sems g-yeng ba ni /
translated: A distracted mind

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: is suffering.

original: gang sems g-yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni /🔽sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: gang sems g-yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: The ripening of a distracted mind🔽is the realm of the hells,🔽the animal realm,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or the world of Yama.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone others.

original: de'i phyir khyed kyis g-yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis g-yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, we will not give you the opportunity to be distracted even for a moment.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: I teach the Dharma to those who are lazy, saying, ‘Come here, you who are lazy!

original: sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /🔽kye skyes bu dag /🔽shes rab 'chal ba ni /
analyzed: sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te / kye skyes bu dag / shes rab 'chal ba ni /
translated: Translation: I teach the Dharma to those who have faulty wisdom, saying, ‘Come here, you who have faulty wisdom!

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /🔽shes rab 'chal bas ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste / shes rab 'chal bas ni /
translated: Faulty wisdom is suffering.

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: Those who have faulty wisdom are unable to accomplish their own welfare,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci @376b smos te; shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci @376b smos te; shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni /
translated: let alone the welfare of others. The result of faulty wisdom is rebirth as a hell being,

original: sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /🔽gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam / gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: an animal, or a hungry ghost.

original: de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, you should not give an opportunity to even a single thought of faulty wisdom.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //🔽'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to // 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro //
translated: I teach the Dharma to those who are lazy, saying, ‘Come here, you who are lazy!🔽I teach the Dharma to those who have faulty wisdom, saying, ‘Come here, you who have faulty wisdom!🔽I teach the Dharma to those who have desire, connecting them with the repulsive.

original: zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro //
translated: I teach the Dharma to those who have hatred, connecting them with love.

original: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro //
analyzed: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro //
translated: those who are confused he connects with dependent origination;

original: lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te /
analyzed: lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te /
translated: those who have entered bad paths he connects with the right path,

original: nyan thos kyi lam mam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi lam mam /
translated: whether it be the śrāvaka path,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
translated: the pratyekabuddha path,🔽or the buddha path.

original: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: He teaches them the Dharma like this:

original: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni /
analyzed: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni /
translated: ‘Those phenomena that you have become fixated on

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: are empty of an inherent nature.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni /
translated: Phenomena that are empty of an inherent nature

original: mngon par zhen par mi nus te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi nus te /
translated: cannot be fixated on.

original: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do; ;zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do; ;zhes chos ston to //
translated: There is no fixation on emptiness.’

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, that is how

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no //
translated: “When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they stand in the clairvoyances and work for the welfare of beings.

original: de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste /
analyzed: de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste /
translated: “With that very pure divine eye, which surpasses the human, they see all the world systems in the west.

original: de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song @377a *//
analyzed: de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song @377a *//
translated: They go there by means of their magical power

original: zhing sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: zhing sbyin pa'am /
translated: and give gifts,

original: tshul khrims sam /🔽bzod pa'am / brtson 'grus sam /
analyzed: tshul khrims sam / bzod pa'am / brtson 'grus sam /
translated: guard morality,🔽cultivate patience,

original: bsam gtan nam /
analyzed: bsam gtan nam /
translated: strive energetically,🔽become absorbed in meditative concentration,

original: shes rab bam /
analyzed: shes rab bam /
translated: and cultivate wisdom.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam /
translated: They cultivate the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams sam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams sam /
translated: the right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
translated: the legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po rnams sam /
analyzed: dbang po rnams sam /
translated: the faculties,

original: stobs rnams sam /
analyzed: stobs rnams sam /
translated: the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
translated: the aspects of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
translated: and the path.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /

original: bsam gtan rnams sam /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams sam /
translated: the meditative stabilities;

original: tshad med pa rnams sam /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams sam /

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /

original: rnam par thar pa rnams sam /🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams sam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams sam / ting nge 'dzin rnams sam /
translated: the aspects of liberation;🔽the meditative stabilizations;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: the serial absorptions;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas;

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
translated: the fearlessnesses;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam /🔽byams pa chen po'am /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam / byams pa chen po'am /
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges;🔽great love;

original: snying rje chen po'am /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'am /
translated: great compassion;🔽the distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam; nyan thos kyi chos sam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam; nyan thos kyi chos sam /
translated: the śrāvaka attributes;

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
translated: the pratyekabuddha attributes;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
translated: the bodhisattva attributes;🔽and the buddha attributes.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de /
translated: “He benefits beings through the buddhadharmas and does the work of a bodhisattva.

original: de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig /🔽phongs pa ni /🔽sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig / phongs pa ni / sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: ‘Give generously!🔽Poverty is suffering.

original: phongs pas ni /
analyzed: phongs pas ni /
translated: Because of poverty,

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar @377b mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar @377b mi nus na /
translated: you are unable to accomplish your own goals,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyis /
translated: let alone the goals of others.

original: de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /
analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /
translated: Therefore, give generously and make yourselves happy!

original: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /
analyzed: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /
translated: Make others happy as well!

original: phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar par gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not be overcome by poverty, devouring your own flesh, and be unable to escape the three lower realms!’

original: sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te //
analyzed: sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te //

original: kye skyes bu dag /🔽tshul khrims ngan pa ni /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag / tshul khrims ngan pa ni /
translated: ‘Oh beings!

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: Bad ethics are suffering.

original: tshul khrims ngan pas ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pas ni /
translated: Because of bad ethics,

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: you are unable to accomplish your own goals,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
translated: let alone the goals of others.

original: tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni; sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni; sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: The ripening of immoral conduct is rebirth as a hell being,🔽an animal,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or a hungry ghost.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone anyone else.

original: de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, you must not allow even the slightest opportunity for immoral thoughts.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not regret it later!”

original: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: To those who wish to harm each other, they teach the Dharma as follows:

original: de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /
analyzed: de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /

analyzed: sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /

analyzed: de lta bas na /

analyzed: khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na /

analyzed: sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am /

analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am / gshin rje'i @378a *//

analyzed: 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyis / de bas na /
translated: or in the world of Yama,

analyzed: khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone others.

original: de'i phyir khyed kyis g-yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis g-yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, you should not give an opportunity to even a single thought of distraction.’

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos @378b ston to; ;sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /🔽kye skyes bu dag /🔽shes rab 'chal ba ni /
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos @378b ston to; ;sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te / kye skyes bu dag / shes rab 'chal ba ni /
translated: “Do not be regretful later!”

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /🔽shes rab 'chal bas ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste / shes rab 'chal bas ni /
translated: “Those who have incorrect understanding are in a state of suffering.

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: Those with incorrect understanding are unable to accomplish their own goals,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /🔽gang shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni /🔽sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te / gang shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: let alone the goals of others.🔽The result of incorrect understanding is rebirth as a hell being,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: an animal, or a hungry ghost.

original: de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, do not allow even a single thought of incorrect understanding to arise.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not be regretful later!”

original: 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro //
translated: “Those who are attached to desire are to be taught repulsiveness.

original: zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro //
translated: those who have a nature of hatred he connects with loving kindness;

original: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro //
analyzed: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro //
translated: those who have a nature of delusion he connects with dependent origination;

original: lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te /
analyzed: lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te /
translated: those who have entered a bad path he connects with the right path,

original: nyan thos kyi lam mam /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi lam mam / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
translated: with the śrāvaka path,🔽with the pratyekabuddha path,🔽or with the Buddha path.

original: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: He teaches them the Dharma like this:

original: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni /
analyzed: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni /
translated: ‘Those dharmas that you have settled down in,

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: those dharmas are empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams ni /
translated: Dharmas that are empty of an intrinsic nature

original: mngon par zhen par mi nus te /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi nus te /
translated: cannot be settled down in.

original: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do //
translated: There is no settling down in emptiness.

original: zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: zhes chos ston to //
translated: He teaches the Dharma in this way.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, that is how

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe @379a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe @379a *//
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no //
translated: they benefit beings by abiding in the superknowledges.

original: de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste /
analyzed: de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste /
translated: With that very pure divine eye, which surpasses the human, they see all the world systems in the northern direction.

original: de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am /
translated: They go there by means of their miraculous powers and give gifts,

original: tshul khrims sam /
analyzed: tshul khrims sam /
translated: or they establish them in morality,🔽in patience,

original: bzod pa'am / brtson 'grus sam /
analyzed: bzod pa'am / brtson 'grus sam /
translated: in perseverance,

original: bsam gtan nam /
analyzed: bsam gtan nam /
translated: in concentration,

original: shes rab bam /
analyzed: shes rab bam /
translated: or in wisdom.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam /
translated: They establish them in the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams sam /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams sam /
translated: in the right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
translated: in the legs of miraculous power,

original: dbang po rnams sam /
analyzed: dbang po rnams sam /
translated: in the faculties,

original: stobs rnams sam /
analyzed: stobs rnams sam /
translated: in the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
translated: in the branches of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
translated: or in the path.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am /
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation;

original: bsam gtan rnams sam; tshad med pa rnams sam /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams sam; tshad med pa rnams sam /
translated: the meditative stabilities;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: the formless absorptions;

original: rnam par thar pa rnams sam /🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams sam /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams sam / ting nge 'dzin rnams sam /
translated: the aspects of liberation;🔽the meditative concentrations;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
translated: the serial absorptions;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam /
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas;

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
translated: the fearlessnesses;

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam /🔽byams pa chen po'am /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam / byams pa chen po'am /
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges;🔽great love;

original: snying rje chen po'am /
analyzed: snying rje chen po'am /
translated: great compassion;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam /
translated: the distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: nyan thos kyi chos sam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi chos sam /
translated: the dharmas of śrāvakas;

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
translated: the dharmas of pratyekabuddhas;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
translated: the dharmas of bodhisattvas;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can @379b rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can @379b rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de /
translated: or the dharmas of buddhas, and they work for the welfare of those beings and do what those beings need to be done.

original: de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig /🔽phongs pa ni /🔽sdug bsngal ba ste; phongs pas ni /
analyzed: de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te sbyin pa byin cig / phongs pa ni / sdug bsngal ba ste; phongs pas ni /
translated: ‘Give generously!🔽Poverty is suffering.

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: If you are poor, you will not be able to accomplish your own goals,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone the goals of others.

original: de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /
analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /
translated: Therefore, give generously and make yourselves happy!

original: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /
analyzed: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /
translated: Make others happy too!

original: phongs pas zil gyis non cing nyid sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phongs pas zil gyis non cing nyid sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not be overcome by poverty, and do not be devoured by your own flesh. Do not be liberated from the three lower realms!’

original: sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /🔽kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni /
analyzed: sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te / kye skyes bu dag tshul khrims ngan pa ni /
translated: To those sentient beings who have bad ethics, he teaches the Dharma like this:

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /🔽tshul khrims ngan pas ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste / tshul khrims ngan pas ni /
translated: ‘Oh beings! Bad ethics are suffering.

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: If you have bad ethics, you will not be able to accomplish your own goals,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te; tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te; tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni /
translated: The ripening of immoral conduct is the hells,

original: sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: the animal realm,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: and the world of Yama.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone save others.

original: de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, you must not allow even the slightest opportunity for immoral thoughts.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not later become regretful.”

original: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: To those beings who have harmful thoughts toward each other, they teach the Dharma as follows:

original: de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /
analyzed: de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /
translated: “Do not have harmful thoughts toward each other.

original: sems @380a *// 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems @380a *// 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: When the mind is disturbed, no virtuous qualities can arise.

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: khyed phan tshun du sems 'khrugs par gyur na /
analyzed: khyed phan tshun du sems 'khrugs par gyur na /
translated: if you have disturbed minds toward each other,

original: sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am /
analyzed: sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am /
translated: or to be born in the hells,🔽or to be born in the animal realm,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi /
translated: or to be born in the world of Yama,

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: you should not create an opportunity for even a single thought of anger.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Later on, you will regret it.”

original: sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: To those sentient beings who are lazy, they teach the Dharma as follows:

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: “Oh people,

original: le lo ni /
analyzed: le lo ni /
translated: laziness

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: is suffering.

original: le los ni /
analyzed: le los ni /
translated: Because of laziness,

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: you will not be able to accomplish your own goals,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
translated: let alone the goals of others.

original: le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni /🔽sems can dmyal ba'am /🔽byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: The result of laziness🔽is to be born in the hells,🔽in the animal realm,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or in the world of Yama.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone save others.

original: de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o; ;phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o; ;phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //

original: sems can sems g-yeng ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can sems g-yeng ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: To those sentient beings whose minds are distracted, they teach the Dharma as follows:

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Oh people!

original: sems g-yeng ba ni /
analyzed: sems g-yeng ba ni /

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: is suffering.

analyzed: gang sems g-yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am / byol song gi skye gnas sam /

analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: or the world of Yama.

analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song @380b gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms, we will not be able to save you,

analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone others.

analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis g-yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //

analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not later become regretful.’

analyzed: sems can shes rab 'chal ba can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /

analyzed: kye skyes bu dag / shes rab 'chal ba ni /

analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /

analyzed: shes rab 'chal bas ni /

analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /

analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: the animal world,

analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o // phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to; ;'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug ba la sbyor ro //
translated: Therefore, you should not allow even the opportunity for a single thought of poor intellect to arise.🔽Later, you will regret it.’🔽To those who are of lustful conduct, he teaches the practice of ugliness.

analyzed: zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro //
translated: To those who are of hateful conduct, he teaches the practice of love.

original: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro //
analyzed: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la sbyor ro //
translated: those who are confused he connects with dependent origination;

original: lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te /
analyzed: lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la sbyor te /
translated: those who have entered bad paths he connects with the right path,

original: nyan thos kyi lam mam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi lam mam /
translated: whether the Śrāvaka path,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
translated: the Pratyekabuddha path,🔽or the Buddha path.

original: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: And he teaches them the Dharma like this:

original: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni /
analyzed: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni /
translated: ‘Those dharmas that you have settled down in,

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /🔽ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i @381a *//
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste / ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i @381a *//
translated: those dharmas are empty of an intrinsic nature.

original: chos rnams la ni /

analyzed: de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /

analyzed: sbyin pa byin cig / phongs pa ni / sdug bsngal ba ste /

original: phongs pas ni /
analyzed: phongs pas ni /

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos kyi /

analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis sbyin pa byin la bdag cag kyang bde bar gyis shig /

analyzed: gzhan yang bde bar gyis shig /

analyzed: phongs pas zil gyis non cing nying sha nying gis zos te ngan song gsum las mi thar bar gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Do not be overcome by poverty, devouring each other, and be unable to escape the three lower realms.’

original: sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can tshul khrims ngan pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /

original: kye skyes bu dag /🔽tshul khrims ngan pa ni /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag / tshul khrims ngan pa ni /
translated: ‘Oh, people!

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /

original: tshul khrims ngan pas ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims ngan pas ni /

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: you are unable to accomplish your own purpose,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
translated: let alone the purpose of others.

original: gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni /
analyzed: gang tshul khrims ngan pa'i rnam par smin pa ni /
translated: The ripening of bad ethics is

original: sems can dmyal ba'am /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'am /

analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /

analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyis / de'i phyir khyed kyis tshul khrims @382a *//

analyzed: ngan pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //

original: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sems can phan tshun gnod sems su gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /

original: de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /
analyzed: de ltar khyed gcig la gcig gnod sems su ma byed cig /

analyzed: sems 'khrugs par gyur pa la dge ba'i chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyur te /

analyzed: khyed phan tshun sems 'khrugs par gyur na /

original: sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am /
analyzed: sems can dmyal bar skye ba'am /
translated: or as

original: byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas su skye ba'am /

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi /🔽de bas na /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i gnas yod kyi / de bas na /

analyzed: khyed kyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //

analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //

analyzed: sems can le lo can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /

analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /

original: le los ni /
analyzed: le los ni /

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /

original: le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni /
analyzed: le lo'i rnam par smin pa ni /

analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'am /

original: byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas sam /

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone save others.

analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis le lo'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //

analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //

analyzed: sems can sems @382b g-yeng ba gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /

original: kye skyes bu dag /
analyzed: kye skyes bu dag /
translated: ‘Oh people!

original: sems g-yeng ba ni /
analyzed: sems g-yeng ba ni /

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /
translated: is suffering.

analyzed: gang sems g-yeng ba'i rnam par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am; byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: The karmic maturation of a distracted mind🔽is the sentient beings in the hells, the animal world,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig yin te /
translated: or the world of Yama.

original: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed ngan song gsum du lhung na bdag cag kyang gdon par mi nus na /
translated: If you fall into the three lower realms like that, we will not be able to save you,

original: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: gzhan gdon par lta ci smos kyi /
translated: let alone save others.

original: de'i phyir khyed kyis g-yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed kyis g-yeng ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, you should not give an opportunity to even a single thought of distraction.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //
translated: Later on, you will regret it.’

analyzed: sems can shes rab 'chal pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /

analyzed: kye skyes bu dag / shes rab 'chal ba ni /

original: sdug bsngal ba ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ste /

original: shes rab 'chal bas ni /
analyzed: shes rab 'chal bas ni /

original: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
analyzed: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /
translated: you are unable to accomplish your own purpose,

original: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don lta ci smos te /
translated: let alone the purpose of others.

original: shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni /🔽sems can dmyal ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab 'chal ba'i rnam par smin pa ni / sems can dmyal ba'am /
translated: The result of faulty wisdom🔽is the world of the hells,

original: byol song gi skye gnas sam /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas sam /
translated: the animal world,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten yin te /
translated: and the world of Yama.

original: de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis shes rab 'chal ba'i sems 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang mi dbye'o //
translated: Therefore, you should not allow even the thought of faulty wisdom to arise.

original: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to //🔽'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re zhes chos ston to // 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag mi sdug pa la sbyor ro //
translated: Later, you will regret it.’🔽To those whose behavior is dominated by desire, he teaches the repulsiveness of the body.

original: zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag byams pa la sbyor ro //
translated: To those whose behavior is dominated by hatred, he teaches loving kindness.

original: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro //
analyzed: gti mug gi spyod pa can gang ji snyed pa de dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la sbyor ro //
translated: those who are engaged in the conduct of delusion he connects with dependent origination;

original: lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la @383a *//
analyzed: lam ngan par zhugs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i lam la @383a *//
translated: those who have entered bad paths he connects with the right path,

original: sbyor te; nyan thos kyi lam mam /
analyzed: sbyor te; nyan thos kyi lam mam /
translated: whether it is the Śrāvaka Vehicle,🔽the Pratyekabuddha Vehicle,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mam /
translated: or the Buddha Vehicle.

original: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi lam la sbyor zhing de dag la 'di skad du chos ston te /
translated: He teaches them the Dharma like this:

original: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni /
analyzed: khyed chos gang la mngon par zhen par gyur pa'i chos de dag ni /
translated: ‘Those phenomena that you have become fixated on

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: are empty of an inherent nature.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la ni mngon par zhen par mi nus te /
translated: You cannot become fixated on phenomena that are empty of an inherent nature.🔽There is no fixation on emptiness.’

original: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to; ;rab 'byor /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa med do zhes chos ston to; ;rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: in that way,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yin no //
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they stand in the clairvoyances and work for the welfare of sentient beings.

original: de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste /
analyzed: de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste /
translated: With that very pure divine eye, which surpasses the human, they see all the world systems in the eastern direction.

original: de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am /
translated: They go there by means of their miraculous powers and give gifts,

original: tshul khrims sam /
analyzed: tshul khrims sam /
translated: or they give the gift of Dharma,🔽or they give the gift of fearlessness,

original: bzod pa'am / brtson 'grus sam /🔽bsam gtan nam /
analyzed: bzod pa'am / brtson 'grus sam / bsam gtan nam /
translated: or they give the gift of love.

original: shes rab bam /
analyzed: shes rab bam /
translated: They give the gift of the perfection of wisdom,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam /
translated: or they give the gift of the applications of mindfulness,🔽or they give the gift of the right efforts,🔽or they give the gift of the legs of miraculous power,🔽or they give the gift of the faculties,🔽or they give the gift of the powers,🔽or they give the gift of the branches of awakening,🔽or they give the gift of the path.
